-MbNM2LWi7qwre5vEbDI.entry:
There was something about starting out and a hair salon? Maybe my moms hair salon? Maybe in Macon? But at the same time it was a different town but familiar. I was on a lunch break from crossroads pet professional a kennel that I used to work for last year. I only had an hour but it seemed as though I was gone a lot longer. And can’t I explain what I was doing. I was dodging my manager who happened to come into the store on her lunch break. I don’t think she was necessarily looking for me but I hit behind stalls to avoid her. This actually happened in real life in a Walgreens the other day but I was not working that day or I was not working at that job anymore. But I did not want to talk to her at the time. So I had from his from her and checked out as fast as I could. I did some more shopping at various stores that I cannot remember. Then this happened:

Jon receives call fro my cousin Bryon. Looks shocked and sad stars to cry. Hands me phone. Bryon says his day (my uncle) Larry has died. My mom (Who has been dead for over 10 years) is standing there too. I ask if I should tell her. He says no! I ask again, he says no- that Gale was going to tell her ( I don’t  know who Gale is.) I go to the back of the store and ask him in private why. He said something I can’t remember but I didn’t agree with him about telling her. He again said do not tell her to Gale was going to tell her. So I go back out to the store front and go ahead and tell her. She is upset but not too upset because we all knew he was sick. She said she already knew that was going to happen.

The next part of my dream was about being at my house in Walnut Creek. Morning that there was a creek or river behind our house. It was a Walnut Creek. There were a lot of people swimming in it. I had a lot of friends over, some of which I did not know. Some of which I didn’t know but I didn’t at the same time. There was a woman there from my class, Marcel, it was her but it was not at the same time. I felt the need to entertain everyone although I did not want to. I plunged into the river. The water was dark and dirty, there was lots of sand and there was lots of mud along the bank. I let whoever know that I had no idea that there was a river behind our house and that we had lived there for 15 years. This person was my exes girlfriend. She seems nice enough and asked me a lot questions About a side effect I cannot remember. But I felt as if she would ask me about dating Josh at some point, but she never did. In the dream later John comes up to me and is looking really sexy. He grabbed me by the Waist and draws me close. I could tell that you wanted to make out there were people around including my mom. It was teasing the idea of making out with me over and over throughout the next half hour. It was driving me crazy. I really want to make out. I kept getting pulled in and out of trying to entertain people and trying to make this person Marcel. happy. In real life Marcel and explain to me that she did not like it when people or flaky around her. So I felt the need to make sure I was there for her when she had anything to say at all. But all I could think about was making out with John. Finally, we find a spot to start kissing. And that is all I remember

*** Follow up. I just got a text from my cousin Brian he said his dad is coming out today for a quick visit. He fears this may be his last trip. And asked if I wanted to come and see him one last time. This is out of the blue and I have not seen my uncle for several months. He was not on my mind other than the dream I had just had last night. I asked him who Gale was, initially he said he didn’t know. Then we both remembered that Gale is actually my mother’s other brother’s middle name who coincidentally has passed away as well.
-MbNM2LWi7qwre5vEbDI.name: Death Of An Uncle

-MbDxT7vcTMfpEbXlsF3.interpretation: To see a tiger in your dream represents power and your ability to exert it in various situations. The dream may also indicate that you need to take more of a leadership role. To dream that you are attacked by a tiger refers to the emotions that you have repressed because you were afraid of confronting them.
-MbDxT7vcTMfpEbXlsF3.name: Tiger

-MbDxd2c-MMRJhdF2NP8.interpretation: To see a fence in your dream signifies an obstacle or barrier that may be standing on your path. You may feel confined and restricted in expressing yourself. Are you feeling fenced in some situation or confined in some relationship? Alternatively, the fence symbolizes your need for privacy. You are trying to shut off the rest of the world. If there is a hole in the fence, then the hole is encouragement that you can overcome and conquer whatever obstacles may be in your way. It may also mean that your privacy is being compromised.
-MbDxd2c-MMRJhdF2NP8.name: Fence

-Mb3BvC-tTKs5RLVM-DO.interpretation: A lucid dream is a type of dream where the dreamer becomes aware that they are dreaming. During a lucid dream, the dreamer may gain some amount of control over the dream characters, narrative, and environment.
-Mb3BvC-tTKs5RLVM-DO.name: lucid

-Mb3C6dOz1EMMTJ48MiX.interpretation: A nightmare, also called a bad dream is an unpleasant dream that can cause a strong emotional response from the mind, typically fear but also despair, anxiety or great sadness. However, psychological nomenclature differentiates between nightmares and bad dreams; specifically, people remain asleep during bad dreams, whereas nightmares can awaken individuals. The dream may contain situations of discomfort, psychological or physical terror, or panic. After a nightmare, a person will often awaken in a state of distress and may be unable to return to sleep for a short period of time.[2] Recurrent nightmares may require medical help, as they can interfere with sleeping patterns and cause insomnia.
-Mb3C6dOz1EMMTJ48MiX.name: nightmare

-Mb3D-exsOIMpH5UTcr0.interpretation: Recurring dreams are dreams that repeat more than once. They often have themes such as confrontations, being chased, or falling. You can have neutral recurring dreams or recurring nightmares. If you have recurring nightmares, it may be due to an underlying mental health condition, substance use, or certain medication.
-Mb3D-exsOIMpH5UTcr0.name: recurring

-Mb3DULsYsIM7-KcqkB5.interpretation: A premonition is a vision, a gut feeling, or another experience that grants you knowledge of things that haven’t happened yet.  These experiences can be hard to recognize since you won’t realize you had one of these dreams or visions until the event actually happens.
-Mb3DULsYsIM7-KcqkB5.name: premonition

-Mb3EZhGc9dY-Pr7-y67.interpretation: Black symbolizes the unknown, the unconscious, danger, mystery, darkness, death, mourning, rejection, hate or malice. The color invites you to delve deeper in your unconscious in order to gain a better understanding of yourself. It also signifies a lack of love and lack of support. More positively, black represents potential and possibilities. It is like a clean or blank slate.
-Mb3EZhGc9dY-Pr7-y67.name: black

-Mb3EhncfOcCUiJa6VXJ.interpretation: Blue represents truth, wisdom, heaven, eternity, devotion, tranquility, loyalty and openness. Perhaps you are expressing a desire to get away. The presence of this color in your dream may symbolize your spiritual guide and your optimism of the future. You have clarity of mind. Alternatively, the color blue may also be a metaphor for "being blue" and feeling sad.
-Mb3EhncfOcCUiJa6VXJ.name: blue

-Mb3EqbT0WczsZGOGss3.interpretation: Green signifies a positive change, good health, growth, fertility, healing, hope, vigor, vitality, peace, and serenity. The appearance of the color may also be a way of telling you to "go ahead".  Alternatively, green is a metaphor for a lack of experience in some task.
-Mb3EqbT0WczsZGOGss3.name: green
